snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes a 3-D printer providing a custom aid for a child with a rare disorder, reports of battery problems with a new...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes a 3-D printer providing a custom aid for a child with a rare disorder, reports of battery problems with a new Macintosh operating system and undersea research bases.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: 'Magic Arms' and Never Starting Cable TV
